Package ohos.agp.animation

Class AnimatorValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator
      • ohos.agp.animation.AnimatorValue

  • public class AnimatorValue
extends Animator
    Creates a value animator.

    This class is used to create animator sequence values. It is usually used for implementing a customized animator.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  AnimatorValue.ValueUpdateListener
      Creates an update listener, which allows a notification to be received when a value animator is updated.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.animation.Animator

        Animator.CurveType, Animator.LoopedListener, Animator.StateChangedListener, Animator.TimelineCurve

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected AnimatorValue.ValueUpdateListener mUpdateListener
      Indicates the callback invoked when updating a value animator.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.animation.Animator

        INFINITE, mLoopedListener, mPauseListener, mStartListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AnimatorValue​()
      Default constructor used to create a value animator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void setCurve​(Animator.TimelineCurve curve)
      Sets a timeline curve for this AnimatorValue object to reflect the animation value changes.
      void setCurveType​(int curveType)
      Sets the curve used by an animator, which is a linear interpolator by default.

      Sets the startup delay of an animator.

      Sets the duration of an animator.

      Sets the repetition times of an animator.
      void setLoopedListener​(Animator.LoopedListener listener)
      Sets the repeat listener for animators.
      void setStateChangedListener​(Animator.StateChangedListener listener)
      Sets the state change listener for animators.
      void setValueUpdateListener​(AnimatorValue.ValueUpdateListener listener)
      Sets the update listener for animators.

    • Method Detail

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration​(long duration)
        Sets the duration of an animator.
        Parameters:
        duration - Specifies the duration of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.

      • setLoopedCount

        public void setLoopedCount​(int loopedCount)
        Sets the repetition times of an animator.
        Parameters:
        loopedCount - Specifies the repetition times of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, or INFINITE. If the value is 0, the animator will be played only once.
        See Also:
        Animator.INFINITE

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay​(long startDelay)
        Sets the startup delay of an animator.
        Parameters:
        startDelay - Specifies the startup delay of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.

      • setCurveType

        public void setCurveType​(int curveType)
        Sets the curve used by an animator, which is a linear interpolator by default.
        Parameters:
        curveType - Specifies the interpolator type for the animator.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Animator.CurveType

      • setCurve

        public void setCurve​(Animator.TimelineCurve curve)
        Sets a timeline curve for this AnimatorValue object to reflect the animation value changes.
        Parameters:
        curve - Indicates the curve to set.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Animator.TimelineCurve

      • setStateChangedListener

        public void setStateChangedListener​(Animator.StateChangedListener listener)
        Sets the state change listener for animators.
        Parameters:
        listener - Specifies the pause and resume listener for animators. You can set it to null to clear the existing listener.
        Since:
        3

      • setLoopedListener

        public void setLoopedListener​(Animator.LoopedListener listener)
        Sets the repeat listener for animators.
        Parameters:
        listener - Specifies the repeat listener for animators. You can set it to null to clear the existing listener.
        Since:
        3

      • setValueUpdateListener

        public void setValueUpdateListener​(AnimatorValue.ValueUpdateListener listener)
        Sets the update listener for animators.
        Parameters:

        Since:
